sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; import Head from 'next/head'; import {loadFirebase} from '../lib/db.js'; export default class jobList extends React.Component { constructor (props){ super(props) this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this) } state = { edit_id : '', delete_id : '', jobName : '', workingDays : '', jobPhone : '', workingHours : '', jobEmail : '', ageRange : '', minSalary : '', maxSalary : '', employmentStatus : '', japaneseSkill : '', jobAddress : '', jobDescription : '', qualification : '', FAQ1 : '', FAQ2 : '', FAQ3 : '' } componentDidMount () { const script = document.createElement("script"); script.src = "/scripts/datatable.js"; script.async = true; document.body.appendChild(script); } static async getInitialProps() { let firebase = await loadFirebase() let result = await new Promise((resolve, reject) => { firebase.firestore().collection('job') .limit(10) .get() .then(snapshot => { console.log(snapshot) let data = [] snapshot.forEach((doc) => { data.push( Object.assign({ id: doc.id }, doc.data()) ) }) console.log(data) resolve(data) }) .catch(error => { reject([]) }) }) console.log(result) return {job: result} } deletePassId = (id)=>{ $("#deleteConfirmModal").modal('show'); this.setState({delete_id : id}) console.log(this.state.delete_id) } viewPassId = (id) => { this.setState({edit_id : id}) let firebase = loadFirebase() let data = {} try{ firebase.firestore().collection('job').doc(id).get(). then((snapshot)=>{ data = snapshot.data() console.log(data) this.setState ({ jobName : data.jobName, employmentStatus : data.employmentStatus, workingDays : data.workingDays, jobPhone : data.jobPhone, workingHours : data.workingHours, jobEmail : data.jobEmail, ageRange : data.ageRange, minSalary : data.minSalary, maxSalary : data.maxSalary, japaneseSkill : data.japaneseSkill, jobAddress : data.jobAddress, jobDescription : data.jobDescription, qualification : data.qualification, FAQ1 : data.FAQ1, FAQ2 : data.FAQ2, FAQ3 : data.FAQ3 }) }) console.log("getting data") console.log(this.state.jobName) }catch(error){ console.log(error) } console.log(this.state.jobName) $("#viewModal").modal('show') } handleChange = (event) => { this.setState({[event.target.name] : event.target.value}) } deleteJob = () => { let firebase = loadFirebase() try{ firebase.firestore().collection('job') .doc(this.state.delete_id) .delete() console.log("Delete successful") }catch(error){ console.log(error) } } render() { const job = this.props.job return ( <> Job Seeker Admin-Job List
  • Job

  • Username
    Profile Sign Out
Add New Job
{job && job.map(Job => ( )) }

  • Email: {this.state.jobEmail}

  • Employment Status: {this.state.employmentStatus}
  • Salary: {this.state.minSalary}~{this.state.maxSalary} Yen
  • Working Days: {this.state.workingDays} Days per Week
  • Working Hours:{this.state.workingHours}
  • Age Range: {this.state.ageRange} years old
  • Minimum Japanese Skill: {this.state.japaneseSkill}
  • Job Description: {this.state.jobDescription}
  • Q1: I have no experience or knowledge of this job, but is it okay?
    A1: {this.state.FAQ1}
  • Q2: this is my first time... to do?
    A2: {this.state.FAQ2}
  • Q3: Is there flexibility in time and days?
    A3: {this.state.FAQ3}
  • Qualification: {this.state.qualification}
this.deletePassId(this.state.id)} data-dismiss="modal">
